page.title: 06Shopping in Grantown
page.content: The people of our area depend on on the shops of Grantown. For a town of its size, it has a{good selection of shops and supplies most of our needs. For a bigger selection of goods, we sometimes go nto a bigger town. The nearest towns are{Elgin}and {Inverness}which are each{56 {kilometres}from us. There are, altogether,{67 shops including{3 supermarkets,}2 fruit and vegetable shops,{3 bakers (1 with hot {food carry out),}3 butchers,{1 fish {and chip shop,}6 clothes shops,{1 shoe {shop,}2 hair dressers,{1 jeweller,}2 garages,{3 filling stations}and 1 chemist. There are also{11 craft/ gift {shops}to cater for the tourists. Grantown shops are also very good for catching up on local news. They are{friendly}places. Most people enjoy shopping in Grantown.
